text: Maruyamu no ko isa ga, ko itta toki o omoiokose. `Isuraeru no shison-tachi yo, hontoni watashi wa, anata gata ni (tsukawasa reta) arra no shito de, watashi yori izen ni,(kudasarete iru) rippo o kakusho shi, mata watashi no nochi ni kuru shito no kippo o ataeru. Sono namae wa, ahamadodearu.'Daga kare ga meisho o motte arawareta toki, kare-ra wa,`kore wa akiraka ni majutsudearu.' To itta
